title: Quantum Braided Poincar\'E Group
abstract: A new deformation of the of the Poincar\'e group and of the Minkowski space-time is given. From the mathematical point of view this deformation is rather quantum-braided group. Global and local structure of this quantum-braided Poincar\'e group is investigated. A kind of ``quantum metrics'' is introduced in the $q$-Minkowski space.
